docs.snippet: Foreign exchanges after starting weak and lower yesterday, somewhat under the influence of an irregular London market, turned strong around midday, regaining earlier losses and closing in most instances at fractional gains over Saturday's final.
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchanges after starting weak and lower yesterday, somewhat under the influence of an irregular London market, turned strong around midday, regaining earlier losses and closing in most instances at fractional gains over Saturday's final.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE.; Rates Start Weak and at Concessions, but Midday RallyBrings Recovery.

docs.snippet: Cable dispatches suggesting the remission of the French war debt by England in turn for a lightening of Germany's obligations to the Allies, yesterday accounted for a sharp and substantial rise in the European exchanges.
docs.lead_paragraph: Cable dispatches suggesting the remission of the French war debt by England in turn for a lightening of Germany's obligations to the Allies, yesterday accounted for a sharp and substantial rise in the European exchanges.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE.; Rates Move Up Sharply on British War Debt Proposal-- Marks, However, Decline.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, July 22 (Associated Press).--Formation of an American League of Nations will be proposed by Uruguay at the next PanAmerican conference to be held in Santiago, Chile, in May, 1923. This announcement was made in a speech by ...

docs.abstract: plans outlined by Foreign Minister Buero at luncheon of Amer Assn in Montevideo

headline.main: LEAGUE OF NATIONS IN AMERICA ASKED; Uruguay Will Propose a Plan at Pan-American Conference in Santiago Next May. FOR WESTERN HARMONY American Association in Montevideo Hears Foreign Minister Outline North and South Union.

FOREIGN EXCHANGE; German Marks Again at New Low--French and Belgian Heavy.
FOREIGN EXCHANGE; Marks Record Another New Low Price at 14 --Others Steady.
